alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 17 at 6:55PM CST until November 18 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 8 AM CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 28 to 31 expected. * WHERE...In Alabama, Mobile Central and Baldwin Central Counties. In Florida, Escambia Inland, Santa Rosa Inland and Okaloosa Inland Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 8 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
